name: Information Super Highway
description:
Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2022. The theme was 'Duality', we chose to make a game about inside vs outside. Take the challenge, see how far you can go!

How to play:

Controls are WASD.

Use A and D to turn Left and Right, and W and S to move between the inside and outside. If you can't move outside, there is a wall in the way, choose your moments to switch carefully. Practice makes perfect!
